events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-03-30 resulting in significant front-end damage.
Upon review, the claim was categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the vehicle collision details provided.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist the customer throughout the claim process for their vehicle accident.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that the investigation will begin shortly.
Additional documents including police report and repair estimates have been requested from the insured to proceed.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including photos of vehicle damage and official accident report.
Internal investigation started to verify claim validity and assess the extent of damages from the auto accident.
Investigation completed confirming the damages and liability based on submitted evidence and police report.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer based on vehicle damage assessment and policy coverage.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling.
The claim has been formally approved by the claims department following customer acceptance of the settlement.
Payment for the approved claim amount was successfully issued to the policyholderâ€™s bank account.
The insurance claim has been closed officially after confirming the customer received the payment and was satisfied.
All claim files and documentation have been archived as per company protocol for auto accident claims.
